variable.name: COCLARRE

variable.value: No lens opacity or some lens opacity but not sufficient to expect reduced visual acuity
Lens opacity sufficient to reduce visual acuity but not to less than 20/100
Lens opacity sufficient to reduce visual acuity but not less than 20/100

Lens opacity sufficient to reduce visual acuity but not less than 20/101
